properties.entry:
CSVWriter throws StringIndexOutOfBoundsException when a column value is an empty string:
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 0 at java.lang.String.charAt(String.java:687) at csv.impl.CSVWriter.columnNeedsDelimiting(CSVWriter.java:307) at csv.impl.CSVWriter.prepareColumn(CSVWriter.java:284) at csv.impl.CSVWriter.printRow(CSVWriter.java:253)
